title: A Countess Captured for the Captain: A Steamy Historical Regency Romance Novel (Wicked Spinster Chronicles Book 2)
features: To yearn for the forbidden is to give in to the dark side…

An outcast in her own home by her terrible step-mother, Lady Samantha Crawford has resolved that she will never bind herself to a man. But as her arranged betrothal delivers the final blow, she has no choice but to flee.What Nox, Captain of The Rosa Mystica, never expected was that plundering a merchant ship would provide him with the most valuable treasure he has ever laid eyes on. Or that she would be the key to unlocking a past he has no recollection of.Caught in the midst of their tempestuous attraction, Samantha’s heart threatens to sink when her father leads Nox to the gallows. For, only a miracle could help him regain his memory and escape the hangman’s noose once and for all.
*If you like a realistic yet steamy depiction of the Regency and Victorian era, then
A Countess Captured for the Captain
is the novel for you. This is Ava's 12th novel, a historical Regency romance standalone novel of 60,000 words (around 300 pages). No cheating, no cliffhangers, and a strong happily ever after.
Pick up "A Countess Captured for the Captain" today to discover Ava's fantastic new story!
description: Here's what some readers have said about the book:
"I Highly Recommend this fabulous novel of adventure, strong characters and a solid well-planned storyline filled with more twists and excitement than you can imagine" - Bubba's Girl, Amazon review

"I love historical romances, this was no exception. It was so well written, the words flowed across the pages. I have read other books by this talented author, and have enjoyed all of them. She is truly a talented story teller." - Kindle Customer, Amazon review

"Deception, love and treachery are all found in Ava MacAdam's new book, A Countess Captured for the Captain. The book contains not one, but two cliff hangers, keeping the reader on the edge of her/his seat." - Teddy, Amazon review

"This story has a little bit of something that everyone will enjoy. It's has a mixture of Cinderella with the evil stepmother and Pirates of the Caribbean with Captain Nox. There are other interesting issues as well as like a forgotten memory, murder, greed, deception, friendship." - Pamela, Amazon review
